title: Last dance
creator_credit: Touchstone Pictures, Steven Haft and Bruce Beresford
brief_description: After 12 years behind bars for a double murder, Cindy Liggett is prepared to die. What she is not prepared for is the relationship she develops with the man assigned to save her life, attorney Rick Hayes. Cast includes Sharon Stone, Rob Morrow, Randy Quaid, Peter Gallagher, Jack Thompson.
